thread.title: Roz the Diva's Mermaid Photo Shoot
thread.title_full: Roz the Diva's Mermaid Photo Shoot | POPSUGAR Fitness

author: Kelsey Garcia
title: Roz the Diva's Mermaid Photo Shoot
text:
And for my grand Hawaiian finale, I'm a gotdamn mermaid (more pics soon!). @coralscandidphotography SL YED with her camera at sunrise.
A post shared by Roz The Diva (@rozthediva) on Mar 16, 2017 at 10:24am PDT
In her day-to-day, Roz Mays is a pole dancing instructor and badass body-positive activist â€” but on a recent sunny day in Waikiki, HI, Roz transformed into a fabulous mermaid.
Roz recently took to Instagram to share pictures from her mermaid-inspired photo shoot with Coral's Candid Photography . In the pictures, she sported a shell bra top, pink lei, and a giant pink mermaid tail, of course. Roz hilariously noted in one of her captions, "I'm a gotdamn mermaid."
Related:
This Mermaid Toast Is as Gorgeous as It Is Healthy
While Roz loved her empowering photoshoot, she was unfortunately the target of some unwarranted comments. Faced with some particularly negative responses, Roz decided to share screenshots of some of the hateful comments in an attempt to hold those people accountable. One comment read , "Don't go in the water. The fish is bad."
ADVERTISEMENT
